bill_title: add a section of highway in Minnehaha County to the state trunk highway system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to add a section of highway in Minnehaha County to the state trunk highway system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 31-4 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The state trunk highway system includes the following in Minnehaha County: From a point on Interstate Highway 90 at Hartford exit number 387 thence proceeding north approximately one and one-half miles to State Highway 38. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
